title: Spotify's Top 10 most streamed tracks
text:
Spotify's Top 10 most streamed tracks 
THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Monday, October 26, 2015 11:52 AM EDT | Updated: Monday, October 26, 2015 12:08 PM EDT Drake. WENN Fans poke fun at Drake's 'Hotline Bling' dancing 
The following list represents the most streamed tracks on Spotify, based on the number of people who shared it divided by the number who listened to it, from Friday, Oct. 16 to Thursday, Oct. 22 via Facebook, Tumblr, Twitter and Spotify. 
CANADA 
1. Drake, "Hotline Bling" (Cash Money Records Inc.) 
2. One Direction, "Perfect" (Sony Music Entertainment UK Ltd.) 
3. Justin Bieber, "What Do You Mean?" (Def Jam Recordings) 
4. The Weeknd, "The Hills" (Republic Records) 
5. The Weeknd, "Can't Feel My Face" (Republic Records) 
6. Drake and Future, "Jumpman" (Cash Money Records Inc.) 
7. R. City featuring Adam Levine, "Locked Away" (Kemosabe Records) 
8. Selena Gomez, "Good for You" (Interscope Records) 
9. Major Lazer & DJ Snake featuring MO, "Lean On" (Mad Decent) 
10. Ellie Goulding, "On My Mind" (Polydor Ltd.) 
UNITED STATES 
1. Drake, "Hotline Bling" (Cash Money Records Inc.) 
2. The Weeknd, "The Hills" (Republic Records) 
3. Drake and Future, "Jumpman" (Cash Money Records Inc.) 
4. Justin Bieber, "What Do You Mean?" (Def Jam Recordings) 
5. One Direction, "Perfect" (Sony Music Entertainment UK Ltd.) 
6. The Weeknd, "Can't Feel My Face" (Republic Records) 
7. Shawn Mendes, "Stitches" (Island Records) 
8. Fetty Wap featuring Remy Boyz, "679" (300 Entertainment) 
9. Selena Gomez, "Same Old Love" (Interscope Records) 
10. Ellie Goulding, "On My Mind" (Polydor Ltd.) 
UNITED KINGDOM 
1. Justin Bieber, "What Do You Mean?" (Def Jam Recordings) 
2. Drake, "Hotline Bling" (Cash Money Records Inc.) 
3. One Direction, "Perfect" (Sony Music Entertainment UK Ltd.) 
4. R. City featuring Adam Levine, "Locked Away" (Kemosabe Records) 
5. The Weeknd, "Can't Feel My Face" (Republic Records) 
6. Calvin Harris & Disciples, "How Deep is Your Love" (Sony Music Entertainment UK Ltd.) 
7. The Weeknd, "The Hills" (Republic Records) 
8. Sigala, "Easy Love (Original Mix)" (Ministry of Sound Recordings) 
9. Ellie Goulding, "On My Mind" (Polydor Ltd.) 
10. Zara Larsson featuring MNEK, "Never Forget You" (Sony Music Entertainment Sweden AB) 
GLOBAL 
1. Justin Bieber, "What Do You Mean?" (Def Jam Recordings) 
2. Drake, "Hotline Bling" (Cash Money Records Inc.) 
3. One Direction, "Perfect" (Sony Music Entertainment UK Ltd.) 
4. The Weeknd, "Can't Feel My Face" (Republic Records) 
5. The Weeknd, "The Hills" (Republic Records) 
6. R. City featuring Adam Levine, "Locked Away" (Kemosabe Records) 
7. Shawn Mendes, "Stitches" (Island Records) 
8. Major Lazer & DJ Snake featuring MO, "Lean On" (Mad Decent) 
9. Calvin Harris & Disciples, "How Deep is Your Love" (Sony Music Entertainment UK Ltd.) 
10. Ellie Goulding, "On My Mind" (Polydor Ltd.)
